close.description: Alt label text for an X icon button in alert.

extensionDescription.message: Integre la VPN in Firefox: esclût schedis, stabilìs lis posizions pai sîts e tant altri!

back.description: Alternative text attribute for back button.

titleServerList.description: Title for a dialog where users can set the location for a website.

selectWebsiteLocation.message: Selezione la posizion pal sît web

titlePageSettings.description: The header for website specific settings, i.e. exclude a page from VPN.

excludePageFor.message: Disative simpri la protezion VPN par $ORIGIN$
excludePageFor.description: Setting to exclude a website from VPN.

resetPageSettings.message: Ristabilìs lis preferencis pal sît web
resetPageSettings.description: Button text to reset all site specific settings.

vpnIsOn.message: La protezion VPN par Firefox e je ative
vpnIsOn.description: Header to signal that VPN connection is enabled.

vpnIsOff.message: La protezion VPN par Firefox e je disativade
vpnIsOff.description: Header to signal that VPN connection is disabled.

extensionVpnIsOff.message: Mozilla VPN e je ancjemò ative e ti protêç il rest dal to computer.
extensionVpnIsOff.description: Popup subtitle when the extension VPN is off, but the client VPN is on.

vpnOffStatus.description: Label indicating that the VPN is off.

vpnOnStatus.description: Label indicating that the VPN is on.

placeholderSearchWebsites.description: Placeholder text for the search input field to search websites.

tableHeadingWebsite.description: Table heading for the column listing websites.

tableHeadingVpnStatus.description: Table heading for the column indicating whether the VPN is on or off for a website.

headlineNoWebsitePreferences.message: No tu âs ancjemò stabilît nissune preference pai sîts web
headlineNoWebsitePreferences.description: Headline shown when the user hasn’t set any website preferences.

noWebsitePreferencesSubText.message: Cu la estension par Firefox tu puedis disativâ la protezion di Mozilla VPN par un sît web o stabilî une posizion personalizade. Par podêlu fâ, visite un sît web, vierç la estension e inzorne la preference relative al sît.
noWebsitePreferencesSubText.description: Subtext shown when there are no website preferences set by the user.

altTextRemoveWebsiteButton.description: Alternative text for the button that removes a website rule from the list of preferences.

altTextOpenSettingsPage.description: Alternative text for the button that opens the Extensions Settings page.

searchServer.description: Placeholder for the Input field where users can search the list of servers.

bodySubscribeNow2.message: No rivìn a cjatâ un abonament associât al account doprât par jentrâ te aplicazion Mozilla VPN.
bodySubscribeNow2.description: Body of an error message, shown if the user is trying to use the extension without a subscription.

footerSubscribeNow.message: Par doprâ cheste estension, prime aboniti.
footerSubscribeNow.description: Footer for bodySubscribeNow2, shown if the user is trying to use the extension without a subscription.

btnSubscribeNow.description: Call to action button for users to subscribe to Mozilla VPN.

getHelp.description: Text of a link pointing to a relevant help page.

bodySignedOut.message: In chest moment tu sês disconetût/disconetude de aplicazion Mozilla VPN. Par doprâ la estension Mozilla VPN par Firefox, vierç la aplicazion sul computer e jentre tal to account.

headerNeedsUpdate.description: This is the headline of an error panel.

bodyNeedsUpdate2.message: Par doprâ cheste estension, prime discjame e instale la version plui resinte de aplicazion Mozilla VPN.
bodyNeedsUpdate2.description: This is body copy for an error message.

headerInstallMsg.description: Header if a VPN installation was not found.

bodyOpenMsg.message: Par doprâ la estension Mozilla VPN par Firefox, vierç prime la aplicazion Mozilla VPN.

bodyInstallMsg.message: Par doprâ cheste estension, prime discjame e instale la aplicazion Mozilla VPN sul to computer.

bodyInstallMsgFooter.message: Impensiti che Mozilla VPN al è un servizi a paiament in abonament.

btnDownloadNow.description: This is a call to action button to download the VPN.

defaultLocationHeader.message: Dopre la posizion di Mozilla VPN.

useDefaultLocationExplainer.message: Dopre la stesse posizion de aplicazion Mozilla VPN par protezi chest computer.
useDefaultLocationExplainer.description: Explanation of what “Use default Mozilla VPN Location” means.

bodyUnsupportedOSMessage.message: In chest moment, la estension Mozilla VPN e je disponibile nome sui dispositîfs Windows.

footnoteUnsupportedOSMessage.message: O sin daûr a lavorâ par supuartâ ca di pôc ancje macOS e Linux!

websiteProtection.description: A subtitle that is followed by an off icon and the word 'Off'.

learnMore.description: Label of link that leads to SUMO.

onboarding1_title.message: Disative la VPN par sîts web specifics

onboarding1_body.message: Cu la estension par Firefox tu puedis disativâ la protezion VPN par cierts sîts web specifics, pûr mantignintle ative par dut il rest.

onboarding2_title.message: Visualize varis sîts web rivant di posizions diferentis

onboarding2_body.message: Gnovis di Londre. Sports di San Pauli. Compris di Tokyo. Stabilìs posizions specifichis pai sîts web par vê une navigazion personalizade.

onboarding3_body.message: Dopre la estension par ativâ la protezion VPN par Firefox, ancje cuant che la protezion e je disativade pal rest dal computer.

next.description: Label of button to progress to next onboarding panel.

skip.description: Label of button to skip onboarding.

done.description: Label of button in final onboarding panel.

headerReEnableFirefoxProtection.message: Torne ative la protezion par Firefox
headerReEnableFirefoxProtection.description: Error panel title for when Firefox is an excluded app.

bodyReEnableFirefoxProtection.message: In chest moment Firefox e je une “aplicazion escludude” te aplicazion Mozilla VPN. Par doprâ cheste estension, vierç la aplicazion e va su Impostazions > Aplicazions esclududis e gjave Firefox.

settingsPageSubtitle.message: Par zontâ o modificâ lis preferencis relativis a un sît web, visite il sît e vierç la estension Mozilla VPN par Firefox. Dopo, stabilìs lis preferencis pal sît. Lis tôs preferencis a son ativis nome cuant che la protezion VPN par Firefox e je ative.

settingsPageTitle.message: Preferencis pai sîts web di Mozilla VPN

noSignal.description: Indicator text describing the status of the VPN.

unstable.description: Indicator text describing the status of the VPN.

connecting.description: Indicator text describing the status of the VPN.

offForWebsite.message: Mozilla VPN disativade pal sît web

websiteLocationLabel.message: $SERVERLOCATION$: posizion di Mozilla VPN pal sît web
websiteLocationLabel.description: Aria label for a flag icon representing the location of the VPN server

alert_conflictingProgram.message: Un program sul to computer al podarès causâ problemis cu la estension Mozilla VPN.

alert_conflictingExtensions.message: Altris estensions a podaressin interferî cul funzionament de estension Mozilla VPN.

telemetry_toggle_text.message: Condivît dâts tecnics e di interazion
telemetry_toggle_text.description: Label for the Telemetry Opt-In toggle

privacy_notice_link_name.message: Informative su la riservatece dai servizis in abonament Mozilla
privacy_notice_link_name.description: Used as text of the link in 'telemetry_screen_descr'

first-install-body.message: Par judânus a miorâ funzionalitâts e prestazions e risolvi besvelt problemis, tu puedis sielzi di permeti ae estension Mozilla VPN di tirâ dongje dâts. I dâts che o tirìn dongje no saran mai associâts a ti e no tirìn dongje mai dâts sui sîts che tu visitis. La racuelte dai dâts no influìs sul funzionament de estension.
first-install-body.description: Body copy on the telemetry consent screen

privacyPolicyIntro.message: Ducj i detais sui dâts che o tirìn dongje a son disponibii te nestre informative su la riservatece.
privacyPolicyIntro.description: Description of what can be found in the privacy policy. Blurb in the telemetry consent screen.

viewPrivacyPolicy.message: Viôt la informative su la riservatece

thankYouForAdding.message: Graciis par vê instalade la estension Mozilla VPN
thankYouForAdding.description: Headline on the telemetry consent screen

toContinueToTheExtension.message: Par continuâ cu la estension, selezione il logo Mozilla VPN te sbare dai struments di Firefox.
toContinueToTheExtension.description: Blurb at the bottom of the telemetry consent screen

optionalDataCollection.description: Subtitle on the telemetry consent screen

telemetryListHeader.message: I dâts facoltatîfs che o tirìn dongje a includin:
telemetryListHeader.description: Headline for a list describing the type of data collected by the extension

technicalData.message: Dâts tecnics, come version dal navigadôr, version de estension e detais sui erôrs, cussì che o podìn tignî di voli e comedâ erôrs in mût eficient.
technicalData.description: Description of technical data, found on telemetry consent screen.

interactionData.message: Dâts di interazion, come il numar di sîts web escludûts de protezion VPN, il numar di sîts web cuntune preference pe posizion, trop dispès che la protezion e ven ativade e disativade.
interactionData.description: Description of interaction data, found on the telemetry consent screen.

telemetryOptOutInstructions.message: Se no tu desideris permeti ae estension Mozilla VPN di tirâ dongje dâts, gjave il segn ae casele. Tu puedis ancje cambiâ cheste impostazion cuant che tu vûs te estension, sot des Impostazions.
telemetryOptOutInstructions.description: Opt out instructions on the telemetry consent screen

telemetryCheckboxLabel.message: Permet a Mozilla di tirâ dongje dâts tecnics e di interazion

telemetrySettingsCheckboxLabel.message: Chest dât nus jude a miorâ funzions e prestazions. Al inclût dâts sul dispositîf, la configurazion dal hardware e cemût che tu dopris la estension Mozilla VPN.
telemetrySettingsCheckboxLabel.description: Checkbox label on the settings page

messageSplitTunnelHeader.description: Header that is shown if the current Firefox is affected by Split-Tunneling

messageSplitTunnelBody.message: In chest moment Firefox e je une “aplicazion escludude” te aplicazion Mozilla VPN. Par doprâ cheste estension, vierç la aplicazion e va su Impostazions > Aplicazions esclududis e gjave Firefox.
messageSplitTunnelBody.description: Helptext body that is shown if the current Firefox is affected by Split-Tunneling

headerSubscriptionNotAvailable.message: L’abonament a Mozilla VPN nol è ancjemò disponibil tal to paîs
headerSubscriptionNotAvailable.description: Header of an Error Screen, shown when the User is in a Country where Mozilla VPN is not offered.

bodySubscriptionNotAvailable.message: L’abonament a Mozilla VPN nol è ancjemò disponibil tal to paîs, ma tu puedis iscriviti ae nestre liste di spiete par ricevi une notifiche a pene che al sarà disponibil. Se tu âs za un abonament, continue.
bodySubscriptionNotAvailable.description: Body of an Error Screen, shown when the User is in a Country where Mozilla VPN is not offered.

btnjoinWaitlist.description: Button Text, shown when the User is in a Country where Mozilla VPN is not offered.

btnContinue.description: Button Text, shown on an Error screen. Clicking it will continue the current flow.

headlineAutoConnectOptions.description: Headline for the Auto Connect options

labelDescribeAutoStartOnPBM.message: Ative simpri la VPN cuant che tu dopris la modalitât di navigazion privade
